## ConstantScalarNode.toString() method

Generates a string representation of this node

**Signature:**

```typescript
toString(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

The parameter name if uniform, otherwise the rounded numeric value

## Remarks

Values are rounded to 3 decimal places for display purposes.
